SELECT T.ORD_NO , T.USER_NO , DEL_ADD , PAYMENT , T.DELIVERY , T.PHONE , T.ADDRESS , REQUIRE
FROM TB_ORDER T LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (T.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE T.USER_NO = ?

SELECT T.ORD_NO , T.PRO_NO , T.USER_NO , DEL_ADD , PAYMENT , T.DELIVERY , T.PHONE , T.ADDRESS , REQUIRE
, P.THUMB_IMG , P.PRO_NAME , P.PRICE
, AMOUNT
, M.USER_ID , M.USER_NAME
, A.TOTAL_PRICE , A.DELIVERY , A.DISCOUNT
FROM TB_ORDER T LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON (T.PRO_NO = P.PRO_NO) LEFT JOIN ORD_PRO O ON (T.ORD_NO = O.ORD_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (T.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN PAYMENT A ON (T.ORD_NO = A.ORD_NO) WHERE T.ORD_NO = ?
